Package com.example.cs213project3

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.cs213project3.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Creates Date objects, converts strings into these objects, and determines whether a date is a valid calendar date

    Date()
    Default constructor for the Date class which creates an instance from calendar class to get today's day, month and year.

    One argument constructor for Date class which creates an instance by taking a given string containing a date and translating that into an object.

    • Date

      public Date()
      Default constructor for the Date class which creates an instance from calendar class to get today's day, month and year.

    • Date

      public Date(int month, int day, int year)
      Three argument constructor for Date class which creates an instance with given month, day and year arguments to create the specified date.
      Parameters:
      month - The month of the given date
      day - The day of the given date
      year - The year of the given date

    • Date

      public Date(String date)
      One argument constructor for Date class which creates an instance by taking a given string containing a date and translating that into an object.
      Parameters:
      date - The date, provided as formatted string, which will generate an instance

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date dateToCompare)
      Method to compare two given dates to each other.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      dateToCompare - the date to compare
      Returns:
      0 if dates are equal, a positive number if original date is younger than compared date, or a negative number if original date is older than compared date

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Method compares original date to given date and determines if they are equal or not.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the date we are to compare
      Returns:
      true if the dates are equal, otherwise false

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method takes a Date object and returns it formatted as a String.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a String containing the date separating the month, day, and year, by the String "/"

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Method takes a Date object and determines whether the DOB is both on the calendar and was at least 16 years ago
      Returns:
      false when the DOB is invalid, otherwise true

    • isCalendarDateValid

      public boolean isCalendarDateValid()
      Method determines whether a calendar date is valid
      Returns:
      true if the calendar date is valid, false otherwise

    • isStudentOver16

      Returns:
